attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The proposed reorganisation of the school system in Suffolk, which would result in the closure of middle schools, is not in the best interests of the children of Suffolk.  We believe that, contrary to the assertions of Suffolk County Council, middle schools work well and provide a unique environment which supports not just the educational but also the emotional and social well being of our children. 
In the absence of any cogent case for change from the County Council, we would urge the Prime Minister to persuade Suffolk County Council to reconsider their proposals and to retain the middle school system in the county.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " help save Suffolk middle schools."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11197.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Suffolk-Schools/
